p:
Deep-sequencing reads were assembled with the shiver sequence assembly software
51 . Where no contigs could be generated with IVA
52 , contigs were generated with SPAdes and metaSPAdes v3.10
53, 54 , after excluding reads classified as Homo sapiens by Kraken v0.10.5-beta
55 . Contigs with at least 300â€‰bp matching known HIV-1 diversity were used for shiver analysis.
